Dero stranglers specialize in capturing living victims, and they are often called upon to aid in abductions. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 [Dero Strangler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2903) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 84 1.1 **Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10 **Str** +4 **Dex** +3 **Con** +3 **Int** +0 **Wis** -1 **Cha** +2 **Items** [cytillesh toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=59) (see sidebar), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (5 doses), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (50 feet), [spiked chain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=11) --- **AC** 19 **Fort** +10 **Ref** +8 **Will** +6 **HP** 45 **Immunities** [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=63) **Ill Glow** ([disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=640)) A non-[dero](/Traits.aspx?ID=749) living creature that starts its turn [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) by the strangler is exposed to the sickly blue light from the strangler's cytillesh toolkit. It must succeed at a DC 19 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91). This has no effect if the strangler isn't wearing the toolkit.
Vulnerable to Sunlight A dero strangler takes 8 damage for every hour they're exposed to sunlight. --- **Speed** 20 feet **Melee** spiked chain +11 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d8+6 bludgeoning **Ranged** hand crossbow +10 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+2 piercing plus [lethargy poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2902) **Occult Innate Spells** DC 19 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) - **2nd** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Revealing Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=1653) **Dero Medicine** ([Healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The dero is wearing a cytillesh toolkit and has a hand free; **Effect** The dero excises damaged flesh and crudely stitches wounds shut, healing themself or an ally in reach for 2d8 Hit Points. For 1 hour, the target has slashing weakness 2 and is immune to Dero Medicine. **Strangle** ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)) **Requirements** The dero must have two free hands or be wielding a spiked chain; **Effect** The dero attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) with a +2 circumstance bonus. On a success, the target also takes 1d6+6 bludgeoning damage and can't speak (including to Cast a Spell) as long as they're [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90).
